      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
          java.lang.Object userInput)
        Function that saves the userInput of the player's view and executes its command. If the userInput is of endTurnInput type, it overwrites the data on the server. If it's a EndGameInput, it still overwrites the model on the server's side, but also disconnects..
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Overrides:
        update in class Controller
        Parameters:
        Observable - object, UserInput casted as Object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the observable is not the view or the Input is not a UserInput

      • callPlayerMenuInCLI

        public void callPlayerMenuInCLI()
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Remote method invoked when the server wants to start the turn of the player. The observer of the cli is notified, thus generating the view commands.
        Specified by:
        callPlayerMenuInCLI in interface RemoteControllerInterface
        Parameters:
        nothing -
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • unlockClient

        public void unlockClient()
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Remote method invoked when the server allows the player to start his turn. It resets the observer of the model and the view since they've been changed undirectly. Then updated the model and currentPlayer stats in pcd. Proceeds then to notify the observer of the view..
        Specified by:
        unlockClient in interface RemoteControllerInterface
        Parameters:
        nothing -
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
